#Zlib install howto (includes W8)

= zlib =

Zlib is a loseless codec library (LCL) that avconv/libav supports naturally, but matlab doesn't.


= Installation =


http://www.fourcc.org/zlib/

Extract the file to a folder, right click the inf files and select "Install".

== W8 "Third party not signed" error
Select "Restart" while holding SHIFT. Go on advanced settings/startup and select the option to disable signed drivers. Reboot and try the installation again.
